N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 30.10 - Audits

State Regulations

Registrants with fleet registered vehicles shall retain
their records for six years and shall make their records and/or vehicles
currently registered available for audit during normal business hours, Monday
through Friday, except official holidays. If, after audit, it is found that the
registrant has misused the permanent indicia of registration or failed to
maintain required records on fleet vehicles or failed to renew permanent fleet
registration vehicles on which plates have not been surrendered on greater than
10 percent of the permanent registered fleet, an appropriate warning letter
shall be sent after the first year to the registrant. If such findings are
found in a second consecutive year or second consecutive audit, the registrant
may be removed from the fleet registration program. Such registrant may then
apply for regular registrations for its vehicles. Notes
